headline: Is Alexandria Real Estate Equities (ARE) a Dividend Trap to Avoid in 2025?
summary: We recently put together a list of 10 Dividend Trap Stocks to Avoid in 2025. Here, we take a detailed look at Alexandria Real Estate Equities, Inc. (NYSE:ARE) and its ranking among the top 10 dividend trap stocks investors should avoid in 2025. During uncertain times, dividend stocks are often seen as a safe bet […]
